name: After School Program - Douglass Playground
description: Participants will receive homework assistance, be exposed to an environment that will promote literacy, encourage communication and empowerment skills while providing recreation activities that include sports, group games, arts and culture, community exploration and seasonal special events. All staff and volunteers receive background checks and are trained in safety skills. Start times may vary based on the school release time.
fullDescription: Participants will receive homework assistance, be exposed to an environment that will promote literacy, encourage communication and empowerment skills while providing recreation activities that include sports, group games, arts and culture, community exploration and seasonal special events. All staff and volunteers receive background checks and are trained in safety skills. Start times may vary based on the school release time.
whatTheyOffer: Participants will receive homework assistance, be exposed to an environment that will promote literacy, encourage communication and empowerment skills while providing recreation activities that include sports, group games, arts and culture, community exploration and seasonal special events. All staff and volunteers receive background checks and are trained in safety skills. Start times may vary based on the school release time.
howToGetIt: Douglass Park Latchkey (staff walks kids from school) www.sfreconline.org to register 1100 Douglass St @ 26th St 415 695-5017 The fee for the school year is $950. Parents will have the option to pay the entire fee upon registration. Payment plans are available. $237.50 is due upon registration and on the first day of October, January and March of the school year.
address: 1100 Douglass St @ 26th St, San Francisco, CA, 94131
